metadata.title: CVE-2014-9493 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
The V2 API in OpenStack Image Registry and Delivery Service (Glance) before2014.2.2 and 2014.1.4 allows remote authenticated users to read or deletearbitrary files via a full pathname in a file: URL in the image locationproperty.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-9493` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

glance - 1:2014.1.4-0ubuntu1
glance-api - 1:2014.1.4-0ubuntu1
glance-common - 1:2014.1.4-0ubuntu1
glance-registry - 1:2014.1.4-0ubuntu1
python-glance - 1:2014.1.4-0ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: glance package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:2014.1.4-0ubuntu1').
